The game has an amazing feel to it, just something different from most games out there today. Only problem is its stale now, its a play for 2-3 games do something else type. Especially if you solo que, game is miserable. I've been playing for years from PS4, Switch and PC. I don't play competitive, the game really doesn't allow you to unless you're surviving with friends. Its a constant modge podge of different issues, constant over-buffing and nerfing of perks and mechanics just has become a hassle. Introducing someone new to the game is like pulling teeth, and the game has become almost niche. 6 years of the same thing with no introduction of anything new, other than killers for the same type of vicious cycle of buff and nerf. Here's hoping for something more, then Skins and and new licensing for yet again more of the same.

Игра очень веселая и совсем не скучная. Особенно за выживших очень интересный геймплей. Захватывает дух порой от такого геймплея. Кто бы вам не попался в лобби - знайте, он настроен на командную игру. Очень сплочённое комьюнити, негатива тут просто не существует. Игры проходят на самом деле тепло и в непринужденной обстановке. Приятно в общем играть. Не бойтесь ошибаться в игре, вам помогут и посоветуют как не повторить ошибку в следующий раз. В игре даже нет багов. Огромная редкость нынче встретить игру, где разработчики постарались исправить все баги. В общем что уж говорить - покупайте и играйте, тем более, если устали от токсичности. Тут все по другому.
Camping and tunneling, can't even enjoy the game anymore as a survivor. Killer get everything done in their favour and its just really bad balancing.
awesome matching system for killer newbie. Hatch is the worst game element that I have ever seen. It doesn't need any effort from survivors and wastes Killer's time if he wants to have a four kill.

This game is amazing, every trial costs a little bit more of your sanity than the last, but that's okay.

Overall this game is pretty solid, though I will say with its age, I kinda wish it was free to play. It would create so many new players and in turn I think it'd help  make more money; cus like any game with cosmetics, PEOPLE LOVE VANITY. 

Now that I got my "please make this free so we can flood the servers with players" plea out; game play is broken down in two categories, survivor & killer.

Survivor- Honestly its really hit or miss if you aren't playing with friends; if you have 3 trolls or noobs does that mean you lose, no, but it def will tank the amount of points you can get, in turn level up characters. It's all about teamwork and making sure you are aware of everything around you. Learn maps, layouts, where pallets and windows are, where totems can spawn; and I promise you'll be able to make a fool of a killer, but don't be to cocky cus I also promise that will get you killed.

Killer- Honestly, this is where i have all my fun. Running around stabbing people and watching them bleed out.... im kidding im not a psycho *nervous laugh,* butttt it is fun. Trying to figure out how the survivors are gonna play against you, what paths they'll try to use on you to loop, It's like a puzzle and man I do love puzzle(I promise im not a psycho) I will say tho, some people get really salty when you beat them at their own game; when they try baiting you just to end up walking in to your own trap, I've straight up had people disconnect cus they rather wait the leaver timer then get hooked by me. 

WELLLLLLL enough babbling on, overall, if you enjoy games that make you think, this is a great game, though you a 1,000,000% can just wander aimlessly and still end up winning xD

Classic. I've played it for years. It's my favorite game.

By far the most entertaining game I´ve played.

Still there´s many to complain about:
The Huntress is way to overpowered. She is super fast even though she can through axes which you cannot evade/dodge. Once I got knocked out by a hatch hinding behind a tree. The hatch went through the tree.

In general most of the Killers' speed has increased immensely and the red stain radius is way smaller than it was.

Many players (including me) encountered gamers using hacks. Recent example was a player who actived all generators within 1 second and the team I was in escaped within one minute.

In my opinion showing auras to killers on the whole map should be removed because it´s impossible for survivors to escape. 
Showing auras still is a wallhack system and a cheat dispite perks/add ons.

There are still players who let survivors farm without killing. That´s still a nice thing even though I know it´s not challenging for all. But for beginners a good start to get bloodpoints.

The Huntress and The Trickster are the most annoying killers in game.
Playing against the Huntress makes the game freezing and lagging as hell. Her humming cannot be located because you hear it all over the map.
The Trickster is way to fast as well and has throwing weapons same as the huntress. 
They are both too overpowered and some perks should be available for these two.

The Legion background music is way too loud and disturbing. Please fix that.

Camping killers is still a huge issue. I know it´s gaming mechanic but for survivors impossible to escape all.
I´m not only complaining about the killers; some survivors are annoying also. Blocking passages, leading the killer to others and running around like crazy so the red marks are all over the place and you can be easy spotted.

Still it´s very very entertaining and challenging, and I do like the survival aspect.

Hola Pablo. Si estás leyendo esto significa que yo, tu padre biológico, he muerto. Vengo a revelarte ciertas cosas sobre nuestra familia. Venimos de un linaje de esclavos. Nuestros dueños son la familia Mesa. Le pedí a Lord Daniel que me permitiera publicar este texto a cambio de 70 latigazos y 20 minutos en la silla eléctrica. Tu "familia" actual solo está cuidándote hasta que seas mayor de edad (dentro de 3 años), y una vez tengas 18 tendrás que venir a trabajar a la granja de azúcar. A mí me han sacrificado ya por lesionarme recogiendo una caña de azúcar. Quiero que sepas, hijo, que te odiamos, ojalá no hubieras nacido, solo has traído desgracia a nuestro linaje y nos arrepentimos de todas las decisiones que tomamos respecto a ti, eres una vergüenza.

생존자들이 살인마보다 강한 게임.
취향에 따라 많이 갈릴 것 같다고 생각하지만.

나를 발전기로 데려다 주던 살인마부터,
사용방법은 도저히 모르겠는 손전등, 계속해서 숨어다니면서 발전기를 돌리다보면 계속해서 들려오는 팀원의 비명까지.

담력없는 사람들이라면 익숙해지기까지 끝없이 비명을 지르게 되지만,
드문드문 볼 수 있는 재밌는 기억이나, 다같이 협동심을 발휘하는 판을 만난다면 그 경험때문에 계속 하게 될 것이라고 생각한다.

다만 살인마가 생존자에 비해 너무적어 매칭이 오래걸리고, 
살인마 플레이를 할 경우, 만나는 생존자의 등급이 너무 높아 오히려 생존자에게 농락당한다.
살인마가 적은 이유중 하나가 티배깅이 심한 이유도 있을 것 같고.

다른사람이 플레이한 것을 보고, 게임을 사도 전혀 지장없으니.
가급적 다른사람이 플레이 한 영상을 보고, 취향에 맞을 것 같으면 구매하길 권장한다.

Die Balance wird immer stärker in richtung killer, als überlebender hat man keine faire change mehr wenn man nicht ein super eingespieltes team hat das miteinander über einen voicechat abspricht. Das campen von killer wird immer noch nicht bestraft, dabei gebe es einfachste mittel das einzubauen. Zum beispiel das der gehängte spieler keinen fortschritt bei der opferung bekommt solange der killer in der nähe ist und es erst dann normal läuft wenn der killer eine gewisse entferung hat. Ich habe das spiel ganz am anfang gerne gespielt bis mir gewisse killer den spass genz genommen haben. Jetzt habe ich dem spiel wieder einen change gegeben und muss feststellen das es noch schlimmer geworden ist.

The balance is getting stronger in the direction of the killer, as a survivor you don't have a fair change anymore if you don't have a well-established team that coordinates with each other via voice chat. Killer camping is still not penalized, although there are simplest ways to incorporate it. For example, the hanged player gets no progress in the sacrifice as long as the killer is nearby and it only goes normally when the killer is a certain distance away. I liked playing the game at the very beginning until certain killers took the fun away from me. Now I have given the game another change and I have to say that it has gotten even worse.

挺好一游戏，就是摊上个这么个制作组，人均单边人类，基本找不到各个版本游戏玩家之间出现的问题根源，有些时候平衡就差那么一点就能改得差不多了就偏要疯狂魔改技能和机制，这版本改的屠夫占强优势，车队我不评价游玩体验在这个版本是怎么样的，单排人类是真的坐牢，前些时候人类疯修了几个版本，屠夫毫无游玩体验，上次玩了一把屠夫一开始找了一会人都连续开了3台机，现在又是人类弱势，那我玩个锤啊，我又不是专修人类，自摸又摸那么慢，修机修一年，自己菜的一批还是单排人类你叫我怎么玩下去，像我这种时不时回坑玩几下的已经跟不上版本的潮流了，血压高的又想看的建议去视频平台看实况，至少你不会亲自坐牢了：）

O Jogo é divertido, mas desde a introdução do sistema de MMR tem sido um porre jogar isso, o balanceamento nunca existiu, se vc joga de killer dificilmente consegue eliminar 4 sobreviventes pois o tempo que leva para colocar um no gancho provavelmente ja tem 2/3 geradores completos, claro isso para killers iniciantes, se voce investir uma quantidade GRANDE de horas nesse jogo para aprender a jogar com varios killers e se aperfeiçoar no negócio ai sim vc consegue eliminar de 3 a 4 survivors, passando muita raiva e estresse claro, isso sem contar o tempo que leva para achar uma partida com killer em baixo MMR. Agora se voce joga de survivor e um pouco mais facil, tanto de achar partidas quanto para ganhar partidas, porem tambem exige uma grande quantidade de tempo para aprender e ficar bom nisso. Acho que seria de grande ajuda ao game e a comunidade que introduzissem um modo casual, sem MMR, pois as vezes vc só quer jogar para se divertir ou testar um novo killer/survivor.
